name: Lydia Venieri
works: Dolphin Conspiracy, Tomorrow, See No Evil, War Games, Forever After, Hibernation, Planetic Exodus, Telluric Manifesto, Platonic Big Bang
summary: Lydia Venieri (born 1964) is a Greek artist, and a descendant of the Greek branch of the House of Venier. Her works have been admired and appreciated by critics.
